benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/customFields/search - Search custom fields by type, name and optional value

covered: Valid Request: Extensive happy-path scenarios verify 200 responses for searches by objectType, fieldName, fieldValue (alone and combined), plus audit levels and pagination; at least one scenario asserts CustomField schema.
Empty Response: Covered via no matches, empty database, and offset beyond data size returning empty arrays.
Pagination: Functional behavior validated with limit/offset, including large values and invalid negatives/zero.
Query Parameters: Broad coverage of valid/invalid combinations, extra parameters ignored, and security-focused inputs (SQLi/XSS) returning validation errors.
Authorization: Missing authentication returns 401 as expected.
gaps: Rate Limiting: No scenarios exercising throttling behavior (e.g., 429 Too Many Requests, Retry-After headers).
Caching Behavior: No validation of caching headers (ETag/Last-Modified, Cache-Control) or conditional GET flows (If-None-Match/If-Modified-Since).
Pagination Defaults: No explicit verification that default limit=100 and offset=0 are applied when omitted; TC01 incorrectly expects "all" items despite default limit.
Produces/Content-Type: No assertions that responses have Content-Type: application/json as specified.
Authorization Depth: No tests for invalid/expired credentials or insufficient privileges (403).

Type and Boundary Validation: No tests for non-integer or out-of-range offset/limit (e.g., offset=abc, limit=1.5), or extremely long fieldName/fieldValue inputs, whitespace trimming, and URL-encoding edge cases.
ObjectType Enumeration/Case: No tests for case sensitivity (e.g., account vs ACCOUNT) or coverage across all supported object types.
Schema Validation Consistency: Only one scenario mentions schema validation; others (including audit=FULL/MINIMAL/NONE) do not uniformly validate exact schema fields and absence/presence rules.
recommendations: Add rate-limiting tests by sending bursts to trigger/verify 429 and related headers.
Add caching tests: assert ETag/Cache-Control in 200 responses and verify 304 behavior with If-None-Match/If-Modified-Since.

Fix and extend pagination tests: update TC01 to respect defaults (expect up to 100 items); add explicit checks that default limit=100 and offset=0 apply when parameters are omitted; verify page-to-page consistency and edge boundaries.
Assert Content-Type: application/json and optionally support for Accept negotiation in success and error responses.
Extend authorization tests to cover invalid/expired tokens and insufficient permissions (expect 401 vs 403 as per policy).
Expand input validation: test non-integer and float values for offset/limit, very large limit beyond allowed max, excessively long/trimmed/URL-encoded fieldName/fieldValue.
Test objectType case handling and full enumeration of supported types; define expected behavior for case-insensitive vs strict matching.
Apply uniform JSON schema validation to all success paths; explicitly validate audit fields for FULL and MINIMAL and their absence for NONE.
